2024.title: Casgevy CRISPR therapy launches in US and UK
2024.description: Vertex and CRISPR Therapeutics launched the world’s first approved CRISPR therapy—Casgevy—for sickle cell and beta-thalassemia.

2024.title: Generative AI in bioinformatics surges
2024.description: Research highlights how AlphaFold2, ESMFold, and RoseTTAFold2 are driving generative AI applications in protein structure prediction, design, and structure‑based bioinformatics

2024.title: Biotech IPOs rebound to $8.52B
2024.description: After 2022–23 stagnation, biotech IPOs rose by 68.4% to $8.52 billion globally, driven by oncology and rare disease startups.

2024.title: AI in clinical trials grows
2024.description: AI-driven patient selection, trial simulation, and real-time analysis became widely adopted by CROs and pharma companies.

2024.title: Bioprinting used in regenerative therapies
2024.description: 3D bioprinting progressed from prototyping to clinical trial stages, including cartilage repair and drug screening via organoids.
